definitions: Bend (something flexible and relatively flat) over on itself so that one part of it covers another.
Wrap or envelop (someone or something) in something.
Give way under pressure or strain.
In card games, withdraw from a hand.
examples: She folded the letter and put it in an envelope.
She folded her arms across her chest.
The company folded after only six months.
He decided to fold his hand.
